auth_progress_intro.en: Mobiil-ID sent authentication request along with verification code to your mobile.

auth_progress_instruction.en: Verify that the code on the mobile screen matches the one visible here and then enter your Mobiil-ID PIN1 into the phone.

mid_not_ready.en: Mobiil-ID functionality is not yet ready. Please try again later.

mid_phone_absent.en: The phone is out of coverage area.

mid_unknown_error.en: Unknown error. Please try again later.

mid_not_registered.en: Given phone number is not registered for the service!

mid_not_activated.en: Mobiil-ID has not been activated. To activate Mobiil-ID visit mobiil.id.ee.
